data.name: Birnchen & Yoshie: Minor Confrontations
data.detailed_description:
Birnchen & Yoshi: Minor Confrontation is a comic style RTS for the small pastime in between.

Birnchen and Yoshie had a quarrel and now want to settle it. For this they have laid out their game carpet and started to build their battlefield. Birnchen has used all her lollipops to build her units and Yoshie uses his soda drop by drop to keep everything running.

With Birnchen everything is fruity, the tanks, the buildings, even the projectiles are melons, coconuts or bananas.
Yoshie, on the other hand, is completely different. He is Angry, so with him everything is more towards the end of the world. Earthquake tanks, lightning, etc., he is just the younger of the two :D
data.about_the_game:
Birnchen & Yoshi: Minor Confrontation is a comic style RTS for the small pastime in between.

Birnchen and Yoshie had a quarrel and now want to settle it. For this they have laid out their game carpet and started to build their battlefield. Birnchen has used all her lollipops to build her units and Yoshie uses his soda drop by drop to keep everything running.

With Birnchen everything is fruity, the tanks, the buildings, even the projectiles are melons, coconuts or bananas.
Yoshie, on the other hand, is completely different. He is Angry, so with him everything is more towards the end of the world. Earthquake tanks, lightning, etc., he is just the younger of the two :D
data.short_description: Visit Birnchen and Yoshie in their playroom and fight each other for a bowl of candy in this colorful RTS! Whether it's fruity attack or stormy chaos, you choose the side!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
